character.statement: To the left is the New You where you can customize your look!
To the right there is a store to buy cool costumes and prizes!
To the far left, there is a movie theater where you can watch cool videos!
To the far right, you can play games in the Star Arcade!
Last but not least, you can jump in your trusty blimp and go on epic adventures!
Tap the action button to try em out.
